description:
Kindaichi goes to Hong Kong in search of Hell`s Puppeteer.  He attends a magic show by "Maskman," a name that the Puppeteer has used in the past.  But Maskman hypnotizes him, and he starts to feel faint.  When he wakes up, he`s walking down the hallway of an empty building, and there`s a dead body in the room behind him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindaichi Shounen no Kesshi Gyou File. 1
The Death March of Young Kindaichi, File 1
Voie sans retour pour Kindaichi ! Dossier 1
金田一少年の決死行 File.1
